name: Realm Catcher
description:
HOW LONG CAN YOU KEEP PLAYING BEFORE YOU PERISH?

REALM CATCHER IS AN EXCITING AND ENDLESS HYPERCASUAL GAME WHERE YOU MUST CATCH DIFFERENT TYPES OF TREASURES AND

AVOID THE WRONG OBJECTS!

Be the collector of treasure and avoid missing out on them as well as picking the wrong objects before your gameplay is cut short due to no lives.

Use your tactics and motor skills to guide the basket to the correct objects and try to survive for as long as possible because the difficulty and 

reward will increase with time.

MISSION

Your objective is to collect as many treasures as you can and at the same time avoid the wrong objects. You will have to try to collect as many realms as possible

because missing each realm will reduce your life, and you only have a limited number of them. Certain power ups will also assist you if you choose to collect them.

All the gameplay stats will be saved and you can play for a better score everytime you open the game. 

KEY FEATURES

· Exciting power ups

· Dynamic touch controls

· Stats saving system

· Tutorial level and level selection panel

· Vibrant environments
